General.Name: Goodyear Lastikleri TAS
General.Description: Goodyear Lastikleri T.A.S. produces and sells tires under the Goodyear, Fulda, Sava, Debica, and Kelly brands worldwide. It offers tires for consumers; and aviation, commercial truck, off-the-road, racing, and recreational vehicle tires. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Goodyear Lastikleri T.A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Goodyear S.A.
